description:
11.68 despill
Remove unwanted contamination of foreground colors, caused by reflected color of
greenscreen or bluescreen.

This filter accepts the following options:

blue.description: Controls amount of blue in spill area. Should be -1 for bluescreen.

brightness.description: Controls brightness of spill area, preserving colors.

expand.description: Set how much to get rid of still remaining spill.

green.description: Controls amount of green in spill area. Should be -1 for greenscreen.

mix.description: Set how spillmap will be generated.

red.description: Controls amount of red in spill area.

type.description: Set what type of despill to use.

name: despill

parameters.description: Set what type of despill to use.
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Set how much to get rid of still remaining spill.
parameters.name: expand

parameters.description: Controls amount of red in spill area.
parameters.name: red

parameters.description: Controls amount of green in spill area. Should be -1 for greenscreen.
parameters.name: green

parameters.description: Controls amount of blue in spill area. Should be -1 for bluescreen.
parameters.name: blue

parameters.description: Controls brightness of spill area, preserving colors.
parameters.name: brightness

source:
11.68 despill

Remove unwanted contamination of foreground colors, caused by reflected color of greenscreen or bluescreen.

This filter accepts the following options:

type

Set what type of despill to use.

mix

Set how spillmap will be generated.

expand

Set how much to get rid of still remaining spill.

red

Controls amount of red in spill area.

green

Controls amount of green in spill area. Should be -1 for greenscreen.

blue

Controls amount of blue in spill area. Should be -1 for bluescreen.

brightness

Controls brightness of spill area, preserving colors.

alpha

Modify alpha from generated spillmap.
